snippet: Economists were encouraged by the data and revised numbers that showed a sharp rise in wages.
abstract: ADP National Employment Report says private sector added 216,000 jobs in February, compared with a revised addition of 173,000 jobs in January; Federal Reserve reports consumer credit rose at annual rate of 8.6 percent in January, from 7.9 percent in December; nonfarm productivity rose at revised annual rate of 0.9 percent in December, from 0.7 percent; adjusted hourly earnings rose 2.8 percent in the fourth quarter from earlier reported increase of 1.0 percent.
lead_paragraph: Economists were encouraged by the data and revised numbers that showed a sharp rise in wages.
